on reading compounds: 消化【ショウカ】digestion (of food), digestion (of information), assimilation, thorough understanding, consumption, absorption, using up, meeting (e.g. a quota), completion, losing one's form and turning into something else
消火【ショウカ】fire fighting, extinguishing a fire
曖昧性解消【アイマイセイカイショウ】disambiguation
kun reading compounds: 消える【きえる】to go out, to vanish, to disappear
消す【けす】to erase, to delete, to cross out, to turn off power, to extinguish, to put out, to bump off
